[Silver's Refrain](/Feats.aspx?ID=926) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>

</column>

---

You learn the [_silver’s refrain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=555) composition cantrip, which aids you when fighting [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30).

<title level="2">Lacunafex Lore</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 72

If the PCs earn Mialari Docur's trust and prove their worth by defeating the Scarlet Triad, she rewards them by granting them access to several feats and spells she and her students have developed over the years.

**Related Feats**: [Different Worlds](/Feats.aspx?ID=923), [Reveal Machinations](/Feats.aspx?ID=924), [Secret Speech](/Feats.aspx?ID=925), [Tweak Appearances](/Feats.aspx?ID=927)
